code:
q = int(input())
bin_q = format(0, '064b')
qlist = list(bin_q)

for _ in range(q):
    query = list(map(int, input().split()))
    command = query[0]

    if command == 0:    # test
        i = 63 - query[1]
        print(qlist[i])
    elif command == 1:  # set
        i = 63 - query[1]
        qlist[i] = '1'
    elif command == 2:  # clear
        i = 63 - query[1]
        qlist[i] = '0'
    elif command == 3:  # flip
        i = 63 - query[1]
        if qlist[i] == '0':
            qlist[i] = '1'
        else:
            qlist[i] = '0'
    elif command == 4:  # all
        c = qlist.count('1')
        if c == 64:
            print(1)
        else:
            print(0)
    elif command == 5:  # any
        c = qlist.count('1')
        if c > 0:
            print(1)
        else:
            print(0)
    elif command == 6:  # none
        c = qlist.count('1')
        if c == 0:
            print(1)
        else:
            print(0)
    elif command == 7:  # count
        c = qlist.count('1')
        print(c)
    elif command == 8:  # val
        bin_q = ''.join(str(q) for q in qlist)
        dec_q = int(bin_q, 2)
        print(dec_q)
